text: It seems like the chaos of this world is accelerating, but so is the beauty in the consciousness of more and more people.
author: Anthony Kiedis

text: I'm tired of all this nonsense about beauty being skin deep. That's deep enough. What do you want, an adorable pancreas?
author: Jean Kerr

text: Sometimes the beauty is easy. Sometimes you don't have to try at all. Sometimes you can hear the wind blow in a handshake. Sometimes there's poetry written right on the bathroom wall.
author: Ani DiFranco

text: A horse is a thing of beauty... none will tire of looking at him as long as he displays himself in his splendor.
author: Xenophon

text: I wasn't afraid of getting old, because I was never a great beauty.
author: Shirley MacLaine
